data.title: Jeffery Proffitt - AppLovin
data.meta_description: Skilled in Game Design, MMORPG, Casual Games, Console, and World Building. Always looking… · Experience: AppLovin · Education: ITT Technical institute · Location: Las Vegas · 376 connections on LinkedIn. View Jeffery Proffitt’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.
data.text:
“I had the pleasure of working with Jeffery when Petroglyph was developing End of Nations. I found Jeff to be a passionate, knowledgeable designer and a great collaborator. I truly enjoyed working with him.”

“I absolutely enjoy working with Jeff! He is an excellent game designer and has done terrific work for Petroglyph over the years. He's knowledgeable, responsible, friendly, hard-working, appreciated by his teammates, and very passionate about his work and games. Also, Jeff is also very self-motivated to learn new skills and apply them to game development. I highly recommend him, and will always welcome the opportunity to work with him again in the future!”
